      • getMyAllChoiceProblemCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from problem where problem_type = 1 and subject_Id in (select subject_Id from possesse where stu_Id = #{stuId})")
int getMyAllChoiceProblemCount(int stuId)

      • getAllChoiceProblemInfo

        @Select(value="select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,correct as ans,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from problem left join (select stu_Id,possesse.subject_Id,subject_name from possesse left join subject on possesse.subject_id = `subject`.subject_Id ) as a on problem.subject_id = a.subject_Id where problem_type = 1 and stu_id = #{stuId} limit #{offSize},#{size}")
java.util.List<ChoiceProblemInfo> getAllChoiceProblemInfo(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           int offSize,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           int size)

      • adminGetAllChoiceProblem

        @Select(value="select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,correct as ans,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from problem left join subject on problem.subject_Id = subject.subject_Id where problem_type = 1 order by problem.subject_Id limit #{offset},#{size}")
java.util.List<ChoiceProblemInfo> adminGetAllChoiceProblem(int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          int size)

      • adminGetAllSubjectiveProblem

        @Select(value="select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,reference from problem left join subject on problem.subject_Id = subject.subject_Id where problem_type = 2 order by problem.subject_Id limit #{offset},#{size}")
java.util.List<SubjectiveProblemInfo> adminGetAllSubjectiveProblem(int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               int size)

      • adminGetAllSubjectiveProblemCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from problem where problem_type = 2")
int adminGetAllSubjectiveProblemCount()

      • adminGetAllChoiceProblemCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from problem where problem_type = 1")
int adminGetAllChoiceProblemCount()

      • getMyAllSubjectiveProblemCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from problem where problem_type = 2 and subject_Id in (select subject_Id from possesse where stu_Id = #{stuId})")
int getMyAllSubjectiveProblemCount(int stuId)

      • getAllSubjectiveProblemInfo

        @Select(value="select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,reference from problem right join (select stu_Id,possesse.subject_Id,subject_name from possesse left join subject on possesse.subject_id = subject.subject_Id where stu_id = #{stuId}) as a on problem.subject_id = a.subject_Id where problem_type = 2 and stu_id = #{stuId} limit #{offSize},#{size}")
java.util.List<SubjectiveProblemInfo> getAllSubjectiveProblemInfo(int stuId,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      int size)

      • getSearchChoiceCount

        @Select(value="<script> select count(*) from problem where problem_type = 1 <if test = \"subjectId != null\">and subject_Id = #{subjectId} </if><if test = \"problemId != null\">and problem_Id = #{problemId}</if></script>")
int getSearchChoiceCount(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer subjectId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer problemId)

      • getSearchSubjectiveCount

        @Select(value="<script> select count(*) from problem where problem_type = 2 <if test = \"subjectId != null\">and subject_Id = #{subjectId} </if><if test = \"problemId != null\">and problem_Id = #{problemId}</if></script>")
int getSearchSubjectiveCount(int stuId,

      • searchChoiceProblemInfo

        @Select(value="<script>select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,correct as ans,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from problem inner join (select stu_Id,possesse.subject_Id,subject_name from possesse left join subject on possesse.subject_id = subject.subject_Id where stu_id = #{stuId})  as a on problem.subject_id = a.subject_Id where problem_type = 1 <if test = \"subjectName != null \" > and subject_Name = #{subjectName} </if><if test = \"problemId != null\">and problem_Id = #{problemId} </if>limit #{offset},#{size}</script>")
java.util.List<ChoiceProblemInfo> searchChoiceProblemInfo(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String subjectName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.Integer problemId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             int size)

      • getMaxProblemId

        @Select(value="select IFNULL(max(problem_Id),0) from problem")
int getMaxProblemId()

      • addChoiceProblem

        @Insert(value="insert into problem (problem_Id,subject_Id,Administrator_id,problem_type,difficult,info_text_content,correct,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference) values(#{problemId},#{subjectId},#{adminId},#{type},#{difficult},#{info_text_content},#{correct},#{choice_A},#{choice_B},#{choice_C},#{choice_D},#{reference})")
void addChoiceProblem(int problemId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   int subjectId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   int adminId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   int type,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   int difficult,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String info_text_content,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String reference)

      • addSubjectiveProblem

        @Insert(value="insert into problem (problem_Id,subject_Id,Administrator_id,problem_type,difficult,info_text_content,reference) values(#{problemId},#{subjectId},#{adminId},#{type},#{difficult},#{info_text_content},#{reference})")
void addSubjectiveProblem(int problemId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                int subjectId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                int adminId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                int type,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                int difficult,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String info_text_content,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String reference)

      • searchSubjectiveProblemInfo

        @Select(value="<script>select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,reference from problem inner join (select stu_Id,possesse.subject_Id,subject_Name from possesse left join subject on possesse.subject_id = subject.subject_Id where stu_id = #{stuId} ) as a on problem.subject_id = a.subject_Id where problem_type = 2 <if test = \"subjectName != null \" > and subject_Name = #{subjectName} </if><if test = \"problemId != null\">and problem_Id = #{problemId} </if>limit #{offset},#{size}</script>")
java.util.List<SubjectiveProblemInfo> searchSubjectiveProblemInfo(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String subjectName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer problemId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  int size)

      • showThisProblemAns

        @Select(value="select correct from problem where problem_Id = #{problemId}")
int showThisProblemAns(int problemId)

      • getWrongProblem

        @Select(value="select wrongproblem_Id,a.problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,\ninfo_text_content,correct as ans,lastSubmit,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from\n((select wrongProblem_Id,problem_Id,stu_Id,mySubmit as lastSubmit from wrongProblem where stu_Id = #{stuId} and wrongProblem_Id in \n(select max(wrongProblem_Id) from wrongProblem where stu_Id = #{stuId} group by problem_Id)) as a left join \n(select problem_Id,subject_Name,Administrator_id,difficult,info_text_content,correct,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from problem left join `subject` on `subject`.subject_Id = problem.subject_Id) as b on a.problem_Id = b.problem_Id) limit #{offset},#{size}")
java.util.List<WrongProblem> getWrongProblem(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              int size)

      • searchWrongProblem

        @Select(value="<script>select wrongproblem_Id,a.problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,\ninfo_text_content,correct as ans,lastSubmit,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from\n((select wrongProblem_Id,problem_Id,stu_Id,mySubmit as lastSubmit from wrongProblem where stu_Id = #{stuId} and wrongProblem_Id in \n(select max(wrongProblem_Id) from wrongProblem where stu_Id = #{stuId} group by problem_Id)) as a left join \n(select problem_Id,subject_Name,Administrator_id,difficult,info_text_content,correct,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from problem left join `subject` on `subject`.subject_Id = problem.subject_Id) as b on a.problem_Id = b.problem_Id) <where><if test = \"subjectName!=null\">subject_Name = #{subjectName} </if><if test = \"problemId!=null\"> and a.problem_Id = #{problemId} </if></where> limit #{offset},#{size}</script>")
java.util.List<WrongProblem> searchWrongProblem(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String subjectName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Integer problemId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           int size)

      • getMyWrongProblemCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from (select problem_Id from wrongProblem where stu_Id = #{stuId} GROUP BY problem_Id) as a")
int getMyWrongProblemCount(int stuId)

      • SearchMyWrongProblemCount

        @Select(value="<script>select count(*) from (select wrongProblem.problem_Id,count(*) from wrongProblem left join problem on wrongProblem.problem_Id = problem.problem_Id where stu_Id = #{stuId} <if test = \"subjectId != null\"> and subject_Id = #{subjectId} </if><if test = \"problemId != null\"> and wrongProblem.problem_Id = #{problemId} </if>  GROUP BY problem_Id) as a</script>")
int SearchMyWrongProblemCount(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Integer subjectId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Integer problemId)

      • adminSearchChoiceProblem

        @Select(value="<script>select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,correct as ans,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from problem left join subject on problem.subject_Id = subject.subject_Id where problem_type = 1 <if test = \"subjectName != null\"> and subject_Name = #{subjectName} </if> <if test = \"problemId != null\"> and problem.problem_Id = #{problemId} </if>  limit #{offset},#{size}</script>")
java.util.List<ChoiceProblemInfo> adminSearchChoiceProblem(java.lang.String subjectName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.Integer problemId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          int size)

      • adminSearchChoiceProblemCount

        @Select(value="<script> select count(*) from problem problem left join subject on problem.subject_Id = subject.subject_Id where problem_type = 1 <if test = \"subjectName != null\"> and subject_Name = #{subjectName} </if> <if test = \"problemId != null\"> and problem_Id = #{problemId} </if> </script>")
int adminSearchChoiceProblemCount(java.lang.String subjectName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer problemId)

      • adminSearchSubjectiveProblem

        @Select(value="<script> select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,reference from problem left join subject on problem.subject_Id = subject.subject_Id where problem_type = 2 <if test = \"subjectName != null\"> and subject_Name = #{subjectName} </if> <if test = \"problemId != null\"> and problem_Id = #{problemId} </if>  limit #{offset},#{size}</script>")
java.util.List<SubjectiveProblemInfo> adminSearchSubjectiveProblem(java.lang.String subjectName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.Integer problemId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        int size)

      • adminSearchSubjectiveProblemCount

        @Select(value="<script> select count(*) from problem problem left join subject on problem.subject_Id = subject.subject_Id where problem_type = 2 <if test = \"subjectName != null\"> and subject_Name = #{subjectName} </if> <if test = \"problemId != null\"> and problem_Id = #{problemId} </if> </script>")
int adminSearchSubjectiveProblemCount(java.lang.String subjectName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer problemId)

      • getChoiceProblemByProblemId

        @Select(value="select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,correct as ans,choice_A,choice_B,choice_C,choice_D,reference from problem left join subject on problem.subject_Id = subject.subject_Id where problem_type = 1 and problem_Id = #{problemId}")
ChoiceProblemInfo getChoiceProblemByProblemId(int problemId)

      • getSubjectiveProblemByProblem

        @Select(value="select problem_Id as problemId,subject_Name as subjectName,Administrator_id as administratorId,difficult,info_text_content,reference from problem left join subject on problem.subject_Id = subject.subject_Id where problem_type = 2 and problem_Id = #{problemId}")
SubjectiveProblemInfo getSubjectiveProblemByProblem(int problemId)
